import { useContext } from 'react'; import { AppContext } from '../context/AppContext'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faRoute } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const MapSection = () => { const { stats } = useContext(AppContext); return (

Optimized Collection Routes

Efficient paths for collecting and distributing food donations

Today's Route

Driver: Sarah Johnson

Vehicle: Refrigerated Van

Total Distance

12.4 km

Estimated Time

48 mins

Pickups

{stats.routePickups} locations

Food Quantity

{stats.routeQuantity}

); }; export default MapSection;
